vote.title: To recognize September 8 - 14, 2024 as Direct Support Professionals Recognition Week
vote.description:
Title
 
To recognize September 8 - 14, 2024 as Direct Support Professionals Recognition Week
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Direct Support Professionals or DSPs are primary providers of publicly-funded long-term support and services for Columbus residents with developmental disabilities; and
 
WHEREAS, a Direct Support Professional must build close, trusted relationships with people with disabilities to assist them with their support needs daily; and
 
WHEREAS, Direct Support Professionals provide a broad range of support including preparing meals, assisting with medications and medical treatments, attending doctor appointments, bathing, dressing, mobility, getting to school, work, religious and recreational activities, and other general daily support services; and
 
WHEREAS, Direct Support Professionals provide essential support to connect persons with disabilities to their community by supporting their inclusion and participation; and
 
WHEREAS, there is a documented critical and growing shortage of Direct Support Professionals throughout the United States, making the recognition and acknowledgment of Direct Support Professionals imperative in a landscape where their essential work is often overlooked; now therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
That this Council recognizes the tireless work of Direct Support Professionals and declares September 8 - 14, 2024 as Direct Support Professionals Recognition Week in the City of Columbus.
